venue.name: Microsoft NERD New England Research & Development Center

item.description:
Hey Everyone,

We ll be celebrating our 10 year anniversary at the Larry Ullman Event at MS NERD.  We ll have special giveaways, some cheering and celebrating and delicious cake to launch us into the next 10 years!

See you there!!

Heather O'Neill
Organizer, BostonPHP

--------------

Four years ago, I shared with you a vision to take Boston PHP to a whole new level.

Make it far better than any meetup of its kind. With the best venue, best speakers, engaging and relevant topics that go beyond PHP, and all the free pizza you can eat.

Run by an all out cast of volunteers and organizers. That believe in the spirit of the open source movement, and doing everything for free.

We are now 3,000 members strong, and the world's largest and most active PHP group. And we are right in Boston!

Not only does that deserve a moment of celebration, it also comes with a responsibility. Let's celebrate with a party.

Stay tuned!

Michael Bourque
Organizer
Boston PHP & Northeast PHP

If you would like to contact me, please send an email to 10years@bostonphp.org.
item.name: Celebrate 10 Years of Boston PHP
